original: Bunth, Alfred Oscar, rådman, Växjö, f. 9/2/%l i Växjö av domkyrkokantor Oscar B. o. Anna Hagström. G. 10 m. Wiwan Dahlin. — Stud :ex. 99, kansliex. 04. Anst. v. länsstyr. i Växjö 02-25, ord. landskanslist 08, e. länsnot., länsnot. o. kronofogde sju år, rådm. i Växjö sed. 25. Sekr. o. omb :man v. drätselkamm. 07-14, omb :man i Växjö-Äsedia-Hultsfred Järnv. A-B 11-41, i Växjö-Alvesta m.’ fl. Järnv. A-B 14- 41, fd. led. av kyrkofullm., ordf. i Växjö stads egnah:nd, v. ordf. i polis-ndn, v. ordf. i styr. f. Kronob. 1. arb:-förmedl., led. av pens :ndn o. byggn:-ndn, ordf. i styr. f. Skand. Bankens avd:kont. i Växjö sed. 40, i styr. f. Växjö-Åseda-Hultsfreds Järnv. A-B 39-41, i styr. f. Räppe-Asa Kanal A-B, v. ordf. i Växjö-Tingsryds Järnv. A-B 39-41, huv:man i Kronob. L. Sparbank, ordf. i Växjö stads kristidsnd 39-40’ o. i styr. f. Växjö ränte- o. kap :försäkr :-anst. m. m. RVO 41.
translated: Bunth, Alfred Oscar, councilor, Växjö, born 9/2/18xx in Växjö to Cathedral Cantor Oscar B. and Anna Hagström. Married for 10 years to Wiwan Dahlin. He passed his student exams in 1899 and his administrative exams in 1904. He was employed at the County Government in Växjö from 1902-1925, serving as an ordinary county clerk from 1908 and as a county secretary, county treasurer, and court bailiff for seven years. He became a councilor in Växjö in 1925. He served as secretary and representative of the finance committee from 1907-1914 and as representative for Växjö-Äseda-Hultsfred Railway Co., Växjö-Alvesta Railway Co. and others from 1911-1941. He was a former member of the Church Council and Chairman of the Board of Växjö City Property. He was Vice Chairman of the Police Board, Chairman of the Committee for Building and Employment, a member of the Pension Board, and Chairman of the Board of the Scandinavian Bank's Växjö Branch since 1940, as well as the Board of Växjö-Åseda-Hultsfred Railway Co. from 1939-1941. He was also Chairman of the Board for the Räppe-Asa Canal Co., Vice Chairman of Växjö-Tingsryds Railway Co. from 1939-1941, Head of the Kronob. Savings Bank and Chairman of Växjö's Crisis Committee in 1939-1940, as well as the Board of Växjö's Interest and Capital Insurance Institution, among other positions. He was appointed RVO in 1941.

occupation.name: Former member of the Church Council

workFor.name: Växjö's Interest and Capital Insurance Institution
